org.anyframe.util.scripts
Class DefaultScriptExecutor

java.lang.Object
  org.anyframe.util.system.SystemUtilBase
      org.anyframe.util.scripts.DefaultScriptExecutor
All Implemented Interfaces:
ScriptExecutor
Direct Known Subclasses:
LinuxScriptExecutor, MacOsXScriptExecutor, WindowsScriptExecutor
public class DefaultScriptExecutor
extends SystemUtilBase
implements ScriptExecutor

default implementation of ScriptExecutor which defines the function to be executed by Shell Script. default implementation was written by Unix command execution.

Author:
ByungHun Woo

Nested Class Summary
static interface DefaultScriptExecutor.ShellScriptCallback<T>
          shell script Callback interface. when executing shell script, implement individual main logic to doInProcessShell.
